forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms before 8pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms between 8pm and 5am, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 67. Northeast wind 2 to 6 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms before 1pm, then showers and thunderstorms likely. Cloudy. High near 84, with temperatures falling to around 81 in the afternoon. Southeast wind 2 to 6 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New rainfall amounts between three quarters and one inch possible.

forecast.name: Saturday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms likely before 8pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms between 8pm and 11pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms between 11pm and 2am, then a slight chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 70. Southwest wind 2 to 6 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New rainfall amounts between a half and three quarters of an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
